ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.2_0: On one occasion the monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka were descending from the Vulture Peak, when they saw two goats copulating.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.4_0: “Let’s give the he-goat the name Dabba the Mallian
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.5_0: and the she-goat the name Mettiya the nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.7_0: ‘Earlier we spoke because of what we had heard about Dabba,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.8_0: but now we’ve seen Dabba copulating with the nun Mettiya.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.10_0: and they called her the nun Mettiyā.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.12_0: “Earlier we spoke about what we had heard,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.13_0: but now we’ve seen Dabba copulating with the nun Mettiya.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.18_0: Soon afterwards the Buddha had the Sangha gathered and questioned Dabba:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.19_0: “Dabba, do you remember doing as these monks say?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.22_0: and a third time the Buddha asked
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.23_0: “Dabba, do you remember doing as these monks say?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.25_0: He then said, “Dabba, the Dabbas don’t give such evasive answers.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.26_0: If it was done by you, say so;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.27_0: if it wasn’t done by you, then say that.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.28_0: “Sir, since I was born I don’t recall having sexual intercourse even in a dream, much less when I was awake.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.29_0: “Well then, monks, call those monks to account,”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.30_0: The Buddha then got up from his seat and entered his dwelling.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.1_0: The monks then questioned Mettiya and Bhūmajaka, who told them what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.3_0: “Did you charge Venerable Dabba with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.5_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.6_0: “How can Mettiya and Bhūmajaka charge Venerable Dabba like this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.7_0: They rebuked those monks in many ways and then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.11_0: “... Foolish men, how can you charge Dabba like this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.13_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14.1_0: ‘If a monk who is angry and displeased, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext, charges a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, aiming to make him leave the monastic life,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.15_0: and then after some time, whether he is questioned or not, it is clear that the legal issue is unrelated and used as a pretext, and he admits to his ill will, he commits an offense entailing suspension.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.8_0: upset, dissatisfied, discontent, having hatred, hostile.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.10_0: because of that upset, that ill will, that dissatisfaction, and that discontent, he is displeased.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.2_0: she is related to a legal issue arising from an offense or either.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.3_0: How is a legal issue unrelated to a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.4_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense, and a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.5_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.6_0: A legal issue arising from an offense is unrelated to a legal issue arising from business, a legal issue arising from a dispute, and a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.7_0: A legal issue arising from business is unrelated to a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, and a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.8_0: It is in this way that a legal issue is unrelated to a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.9_0: How is a legal issue related to a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.10_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is related to a legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.11_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is related to a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.12_0: A legal issue arising from an offense may be either related or unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.13_0: How is a legal issue arising from an offense unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.14_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.15_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.16_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.17_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.18_0: It is in this way that a legal issue arising from an offense is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.19_0: How is a legal issue arising from an offense related to a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.20_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.21_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.22_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.23_0: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.24_0: It is in this way that a legal issue arising from an offense is related to a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.25_0: A legal issue arising from business is related to a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.26_0: It is in this way that a legal issue is related to a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.2_0: The pretext of ten kinds: water at the foot of a cow, a bowl, a robe, one with horn, a teacher, a bowl, a robe, one with ear.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.4_0: a monk sees an aristocrat committing an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.5_0: If he then accuses another aristocrat, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.7_0: You’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.8_0: You’re no longer an ascetic, not a son of the Sakyan;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.9_0: you’re excluded from the observance-day procedure, from the invitation procedure, from legal procedures of the Sangha,”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.10_0: For each statement, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.15_0: If he then accuses another worker, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.17_0: You’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion. ...”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.18_0: For each statement, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.23_0: If he then accuses another person called Saṅgharakkhita, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.25_0: You’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion. ...”

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.49_0: For each statement, he commits an offense entailing suspension.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.54_0: If he then accuses another person carrying an ordinary clay bowl, saying,

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.56_0: You’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion. ...”

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.61_0: If he then accuses another person wearing robes given by householders, saying,

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.84_0: For each statement, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.4_0: accuses or causes to be accused.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.5_0: To make him leave the monastic life:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.6_0: to make him leave the monkhood, leave the state of an ascetic, leave his morality, leave the virtue of asceticism.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.8_0: the moment, the instant, the second after he has laid the charge.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.10_0: he is questioned about the grounds of his charge.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.12_0: if he is not corrected by anyone;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.14_0: there are four kinds of legal issues: legal issues arising from disputes, legal issues arising from accusations, legal issues arising from offenses, legal issues arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.15_0: if he has taught him every time;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.16_0: At the time of those who had drawn near, one of the people.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.17_0: And he admits to his ill will:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.18_0: “what I said was empty, what I said was false, what I said was unreal; I said it without knowing.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.19_0: He commits an offense entailing suspension:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.20_0: ... Therefore, too, it is called “an offense entailing suspension”.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.1_0: A monk sees a second monk committing an offense entailing suspension and the first monk regards it as an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.2_0: If he then accuses him of an offense entailing expulsion, saying,

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.5_0: thus using an unrelated offense as a pretext, he commits an offense entailing suspension for each statement.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.3.5_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on a (unrelated) pretext, is finished.
